class.name: VisualScriptNode
class.brief_description: A node which is part of a [VisualScript].
class.description: A node which is part of a [VisualScript]. Not to be confused with [Node], which is a part of a [SceneTree].

method.name: get_default_input_value
method.description: Returns the default value of a given port. The default value is used when nothing is connected to the port.

method.name: get_visual_script
method.description: Returns the [VisualScript] instance the node is bound to.

method.name: ports_changed_notify
method.description: Notify that the node's ports have changed. Usually used in conjunction with [VisualScriptCustomNode] .

method.name: set_default_input_value
method.description: Change the default value of a given port.

signal.name: ports_changed
signal.description: Emitted when the available input/output ports are changed.
